data.approach: Investigated screenshot showing server shutdown messages. Server is currently running on HTTPS port 3333. The shutdown messages are from a graceful restart, not a crash.

summary: Server is currently running fine on HTTPS port 3333
Screenshot showed graceful shutdown messages, not crash
findings: Vite dev server is running: PID 671845 on port 3333
Server responds to HTTPS requests (not HTTP)
Shutdown messages in screenshot are normal cleanup: WS Watcher, MessageQueue, SSE Sessions
No crash or error logs found - this was a normal restart
recommendedActions: No action needed - server is operational
If repeated shutdowns occur, check for Vite HMR issues or memory leaks

summary: Fixed Supabase API endpoint configuration for monorepo support
Updated component and utility files to resolve server crash issue
Refined Supabase integration with improved path handling

suggestedTasks.title: Create comprehensive Supabase monorepo integration test suite
suggestedTasks.description: Develop a robust test suite to validate Supabase configuration across different project structures. This should include edge cases for monorepo environments, ensuring consistent API endpoint resolution and migration handling. Tests will be located in the project's test directory, covering both utility functions and component integrations.
suggestedTasks.reason: Discovered potential configuration complexity during monorepo support implementation

suggestedTasks.title: Document Supabase monorepo configuration patterns
suggestedTasks.description: Create detailed documentation explaining the new monorepo support approach for Supabase integrations. The documentation should cover configuration strategies, path resolution techniques, and best practices for maintaining consistent API endpoint management across different project structures.
suggestedTasks.reason: Identified need for clear guidance on recent architectural changes

patterns: Use flexible path resolution for monorepo projects
Implement consistent Supabase configuration across components
gotchas: Careful handling of project structure variations
Ensure backward compatibility with existing implementations
